reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Good motel close to centre of town. Very friendly and helpful hosts. Rooms clean and tidy.
reviews.title: Good motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A nice motel in a great town. We stayed in the Aspen Court Motel for 1 night in November 2010. The room was a good size, clean and well equipped. The kitchen area had a hob, microwave and fridge, and plenty of plates, cutlery etc. The room had a very powerful shower and spa bath. Double doors led out to a table and chairs in the garden. The TV signal was good (mix of local and national channels with Sky Movies), and there was a DVD player. The bed was comfortable. There was plenty of room to hang clothes and put cases. All the rooms had parking spaces. It was only 5 mins walk into Twizel (if that!). We opted for beer and burgers at Hunters. Burgers were excellent, and beer was cheap thanks to happy hour! Colin gave us some good advice on a scenic route for our onward journey.
reviews.title: Just the job – nice little motel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Whilst travelling round the South Island we stayed in Twizel one night to avoid staying in the more expensive Mt. Cook. After a day walking at Mt. Cook it was a delight to stay in the Aspen Court Motel. Lovely king size bed, spacious room, they had a pull down bed for my 9 year old, well appointed kitchen and spacious bathroom. A very quiet room considering we were on a main road. Lovely hosts, who gave us information on what to see on our way to Dunedin. A very pleasant night's stay. Couldn't fault the place. The motel is situated in front of a golf course, there is a garden at the back of the motel room and even though the town is newly established, a lovely place to stay. Lots of nice little touches.
reviews.title: A pleasant suprise which ticked all the boxes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: I stayed for 2 nights.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very clean including the smell. Modern appliances although they were cheap. We got a 50MB internet voucher. Spa bath is included not much to say really.
reviews.title: Really comfortable stay in a very pleasant town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice, modern and spacious one bedroom unit. Furniture and fittings all of high quality, unit was very clean. Liked the added touch of a few magazines in the bedroom. The owners were both very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Thank you Trip Advisor - previous reviews again helped us make an excellent choice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stopped off here on our way down to Central Otago from Christchurch. We were actually on a "hot tub of NZ" tour including Tekapo and Omarama (very nice). We like a warm place to sleep having lived in the tropics and with US centrally heated houses, we were a bit worried about warmth in winter in some NZ motels. However Aspen Court was fantastic for warmth. Also very clean, very nice amenities, friendly people. Great place to stay in Twizel.
reviews.title: Great warm hotel in Twizel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In the many motels we stayed in during our holiday in New Zealand, this particular motel was the most impressive. The rooms were large with separate bedroom, extremely clean, very comfortable with every convenience required. After the long drive from Doubtful Sound the spa bath was very welcome. Highly recommend to anybody.
reviews.title: Upon opening the door we were pleasantly surprised

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed two nights at this motel and were pleasantly surprised by it especially as it is in an isolated part of the South Island. The unit was large, very clean with a king sized bed and functional kitchenette . Two televisions and free wireless internet were also a welcome addition. The motel staff were very helpful and it would be the ideal base for Mt cook or Lake tekapo excursions .
reviews.title: Excellent value, clean & friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located near the centre of Twizel the motel is modern and very well presented. The room was superb with good TV, wireless internet and a great spa bath. There was also full central heating so when the evening got cold we were able to warm the room quickly. The hosts were away but friends were looking after the hotel and they were excellent. Really great value.
reviews.title: Great value and spotless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stayed in a range of accommodation over a two week period in the south island of New Zealand this motel stands out as the best by far in all respects. We had a one-bedroom unit as there were no studios available and it was expensive ($NZ140) compared to other motels but the quality was exceptional. And this was the only motel we stayed in that offered free internet. The unit was spacious, very clean with a comfortable king size bed and a well provisioned kitchen and good lighting which we always look for. Even a second TV in the bedroom was a bonus. The motel seems to be relatively new and we were well pleased. It would be wise to ask for a unit at the rear of the motel as several are right on the road and might be a bit noisy. If planning a trip to view Mt Cook this is the place to stay within 65 kms of the mountain.
reviews.title: Highly recommended with free internet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Twizel is, of course, ideally suited for a visit to Mount Cook. It's also about halfway on the route from Queenstown to Christchurch making it a great stop over point. Twizel is really nothing but the Aspen Court Motel is really something. It's a real pleasure to meet people who care deeply about what they do and how they provide service. This small motel is an absolute gem with wonderfully attentive and caring hosts. I have to say it was a bit of a surprise and we would never have found it had it not been for TripAdvisor. Gold stars all around.
reviews.title: Like a lot of people, just passing through

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used Twizel as a base to go to Mt Cook village and it proved great. We found the Aspen Court(or rather it was recommended by a motel owner in Invercargill) and arrived in slight trepidation. Twizel isnt a pretty place!. But we were warmly welcomed by Colin and Sue the owners and soon found ourselves booking a 2nd night because the room( a 1 bed apartment) was clean, well equipped, roomy and had an outside patio area of grass and paving.
reviews.title: A real find..what nice people and a nice motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall this was one of the best all round stays we have had in our 6 week trip around NZ and we would recommend to our very best friends and return ourselves obviously. And there was free wifi
reviews.title: Lovely place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great base for Mount Cook and Lake Tekapo. Great value motel that is clean and tidy. It also has a spa and extremely helpful and friendly staff.
reviews.title: Spacious and well equipped self catering accommodation in remote area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night in Twizel after spending the day at Mt. Cook. The folks in reception were very helpful in advising us to the best place to have dinner in town. The room was very large, with king bed, kitchen and was very clean. A great find out in the mibble of NZ and would highly recommend this to any traveler heading to Twizel. The free internet was also a bonus as most hotels in NZ charge a fee.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This clean and well equiped motel is ideally positioned for visiting mount cook and the surrounding area
reviews.title: good mount ccok base

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are spacious and the spa bath very relaxing after long walks, the staff are very welcoming and happy to give advice
reviews.title: Nice little place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tiwzel is a smallish place with a few eateries and shops but we were made very welcome everywhere we went, as it still retains a village community feel
reviews.title: Excellent motel room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Nice place with friendly staff. Good location on the access road to Mount Cook. Nice scenery around. Probably worth staying for two or three nights for sightseeing.
reviews.title: Best Bed for Miles
